additionalInfo.description: Creates a Project Asset with Measurements when 'createProject' attribute is received on a Customer. Triggered by external services via API.
Check if message contains createProject attribute
Parse JSON and store all data in metadata
Fetch customer shortName for entityName generation
Get all Asset entity groups of the customer
Extract Projects and Measurements group IDs
Get existing projects to determine next project number
Generate unique project entityName (e.g. PKE_P-0023)
Create the Project asset and add to Projects group
Store project ID and prepare Customer-Project relation
Create Owns relation from Customer to Project
Prepare Project attributes for saving
Save Project attributes via API
Prepare measurements array with project context
Split measurements array into individual messages
Generate measurement entityName and prepare asset body
Create the Measurement asset and add to Measurements group
Store measurement ID and prepare Project-Measurement relation
Create Owns relation from Project to Measurement
Prepare Measurement attributes for saving
Save Measurement attributes via API
Log successful measurement creation

configuration.tbelScript: return 'Create Project Error: ' + JSON.stringify(msg) + ' Metadata: ' + JSON.stringify(metadata);

additionalInfo.description: Log errors
